1181350.name: Fantasy Grounds - Forest Tavern (Map Pack)
1181350.description:
Forest Tavern

In the forest lies a small village with a tavern for travelers and a village square with a smithy.
The tavern and the smithy can be used together or separated.
The tavern has two floors and the smithy has one. Three of the maps have versions with or without people.
Every map has a corresponding DM map, a
total of 11 maps.
This Map Pack includes:
  • Overview
  • Smithy A
  • Smithy B
  • Tavern first floor A
  • Tavern first floor B
  • Tavern 2nd floor A
  • Tavern 2nd floor B
All maps are made with tiles and tokens from Shockbolts fantastic art kits.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
